content.description:
Start on head high crimps to the right of the wall. Get high feet, and go up to small crimps just above starting holds. Work your feet left, and then reach left to a vertical sidepull on a flake. From there, follow the flake up, and top out.

 *Side note: the topout is dirty, and a foot hold did break off on me, so be careful of what you trust.
content.protection: At least 2 pads. There are rocks and a small tree close to the landing area.
content.location: When approaching the outcropping of rocks, walk around the left hand side until you come to the opening in the middle of the outcropping. There you will find the route on the left hand side on the big wall.

content.description: This is a new area. It has only 1 'established' route to date (4/11/2020). The rock is very dirty, but this has potential to be a decent area if you have the time and patience to clean the rock.
